# LibraryGenreFilter

**Protocol**

Genre properties your app uses as a filter for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibraryGenreFilter
```

## Instance Properties

- **id**: The unique identifier for the genre.
- **name**: The localized name of the genre.

items.description: The unique identifier for the genre.
items.name: id

items.description: The localized name of the genre.
items.name: name
